Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-5569 affecting package python-zipp for versions less than 3.17.0-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-5569 affecting package python-zipp for versions less than 3.17.0-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-zipp is earlier than 3.17.0-3, affected by CVE-2024-5569
